faqs.question: How do I log in to the lead capture app?
faqs.answer: Open the app and enter the access code or credentials provided by your event organizer or admin. If you don’t have a code, use the “Need a Code?” option to request one by email.

faqs.question: How can I capture a lead at the event?
faqs.answer: You can capture a lead by scanning their badge QR code or manually entering their details using the “Add Lead” button.

faqs.question: What should I do if my access code is not working?
faqs.answer: Double-check the code for typos. If it still doesn’t work, contact your event admin or the event’s help desk for assistance.

faqs.question: How do I assign tags (like Hot, Medium, Cold) to a lead?
faqs.answer: After capturing or viewing a lead’s details, select the appropriate tag to categorize their intent or importance for follow-up.

faqs.question: Can I edit or update a lead’s information after saving?
faqs.answer: Yes. Go to the lead list, select the lead, and use the “Edit” option to update their information or add notes.

faqs.question: What if the app won’t scan the badge QR code?
faqs.answer: Check your device’s camera permissions in the app settings, and ensure you have good lighting. If the issue persists, try entering the attendee’s details manually.

faqs.question: Is it possible to schedule an appointment with a captured lead?
faqs.answer: Yes. After capturing a lead, tap “Add Appointment” to schedule a meeting and log the time and location.

faqs.question: How do I export my captured leads?
faqs.answer: Most apps allow export from the dashboard (look for “Export” or “Download” in menu). If you have issues, ask the event organizer for your lead report after the event.

faqs.question: What should I do if the app freezes or crashes?
faqs.answer: Restart the app and check your internet connection. If the problem continues, contact support or your admin/reception for immediate help.

faqs.question: Who do I contact for help during the event?
faqs.answer: Reach out to the event admin or visit the registration desk/reception. You can also use the “Need Help” button in the app for quick support options.
